content: be the talk of the town with all your wintertime guests with this minimalist crochet christmas tree set add the perfect homemade touch to any winter decor with this free crochet pattern and immerse yourself in all the merry moments of the holiday season the warm glow of twinkling lights the scent of freshly baked cookies filling the room and the joyous laughter shared with loved ones during this magical time of year this pattern offers a textured twist on the classic cone shape of many minimalist christmas trees by utilizing the beautiful bobble-like shapes of the popcorn the harmony of simplicity and uniqueness is perfect for adding a touch of festive magic to any style of home decor choose from three different sizes for your tabletop crochet christmas tree providing versatility to suit any space perfectly adapt your tree to fill that black space on your shelf or add all three sizes together for a cohesive and beautiful centerpiece **pattern information ** this free crochet christmas tree amigurumi pattern set has a difficulty rating of **intermediate** the finished dimensions range from **4 inches height by 3 25 inches width by 3 25 inches depth ** for the small tree to **8 inches height by 6 25 inches width by 6 5 inches depth ** for the large tree ∗ you may also make your pieces larger or smaller by increasing or decreasing your yarn weight and/or hook size respectively ∗finished dimensions are calculated from a model using medium weight yarn a size h-8 5 mm crochet hook the yu/yo method and the following gauge **18 single_crochet x 21 row = 4 inches** **supplies ** * size h-8 5 mm crochet hook * medium 4 weight yarn in 3 colors * yarn a small tree light green example uses big twist value sage * yarn b medium tree light gray example uses red heart super saver light gray * yarn c large tree dark green example uses caron one pound hosta * polyester fiberfill * yarn needle * scissors * stitch markers optional **terminology ** this free crochet christmas tree pattern uses english / us terminology * st sts = stitch stitches * chain = chain stitch * slip_stitch = slip_stitch * single_crochet = single_crochet * decrease = single_crochet 2 together over the span of 2 stitches also known as a decrease * popcorn = small popcorn∗ * blo = back loop only please note that this pattern is written so that each crochet stitch abbreviation is attached to a number such as 1sc 2sc etc this number denotes how many of that stitch is to be worked into the same stitch in other words 1sc = one single_crochet whereas 2sc = two single_crochet worked into one stitch also known as an increase ∗be sure to read through the special instructions for the popcorn before beginning as it is unique for this crochet christmas tree pattern **follow us for more crochet content and amigurumi adventures ** https //virkadia com/ |
